short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds options to filter on the humble bundle store page based on steam data and the platforms the game is sold for on humble.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension can show you (and almost hide) games that you already own on Steam, highlight games that you have wishlisted on Steam and also almost hide games that are not available on the Humble store for a platform you prefer. All filters are optional.
